description: The sugarberry (Celtis laevigata) is a magnificent deciduous tree that will bring beauty to any landscape. As a fast-growing, hardwood tree, it is well suited to brighten up your yard with lush, dense foliage. Its leaves are bright green in summer and yellow/purple in fall, complemented by showy clusters of white flowers in spring. In fall, the sugarberry produces a sweet, edible fruit with a unique flavor. Its strong, wide-spreading roots help to prevent soil erosion and also add great texture to the garden. The sugarberry is an excellent choice for any area due to its striking beauty and hardiness. It's no wonder this tree is an amazing addition to any landscape!
